snippet: Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian says the school is investigating defensive back Josh Shaw's claim that he injured both of his ankles jumping off a balcony to save his nephew from drowning....

headline.print_headline: Sarkisian: USC Looking Into Shaw's Heroic Story
headline.main: Sarkisian: USC Looking Into Shaw's Heroic Story

lead_paragraph: Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian says the school is investigating defensive back Josh Shaw's claim that he injured both of his ankles jumping off a balcony to save his nephew from drowning.
